cu.explanation_en: Setting the RLC log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper RLC layer log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting the minimum RX/TX time to an out-of-range value of 0 will cause timing configuration errors and prevent proper signal processing.
du.explanation_zh: 將最小 RX/TX 時間設定為超出範圍的值 0，會導致時序配置錯誤，並阻止正確的信號處理。
